name: Conciliation Resources
legal: charity and company limited by guarantee
goal: Conciliation Resources is an independent organisation working with people in conflict to prevent violence and build peace. We provide advice, support and practical resources to help divided communities resolve their differences peacefully. In addition, we take what we learn to government decision-makers and others working to end conflict, to improve peacebuilding policies and practice worldwide.
interests: Budget, Development, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
EU policy and practice relating to peacebuilding, including:

THEMATIC:
- Common Foreign and Security Policy, including Common Security and Defence Policy
- Development
- European Neighbourhood Policy
- EU Budget
- External funding instruments
- Gender (UNSCR 1325)
- Engaging armed groups

GEOGRAPHIC:
- Africa (East and Central Africa, West Africa)
- Former SU (South Caucasus)
- Asia (The Philippines, India/Pakistan/Kashmir)
- Pacific (Fiji and Bougainville)
- South America (Colombia)
- Global (UN)
